snippet.title: Shinehill - Official Early Access Launch Trailer | Game Devs of Color Expo 2024
snippet.description: Yet again they dumped the toughest job on you. Now you are on a Shinehill Island, where you suddenly replaced one of the new residents. Explore the world, meet charming townspeople, do farming, fishing, cooking and try not to reveal yourself. Check out the Shinehill Early Access launch trailer for a look at this RPG, its world, some of the dangers you'll face, and more. Shinehill is out now in Steam Early Access.
